name: kx-2023
description: KEEHIN Application Framwork 2023 (Vue3 PrimeVue Axios Express NodeJS Java JasperReport)

scripts.build: npm run kxserv && npm run kxview

scripts.kxview: cd kxview && npm run build &&  cp -p -rf -u ./dist/* ../kxserv/dist/client
